docs.text:
Progress updates - 24 April 2018


I have worked on completing tasks related to final paper submission CMLA




Latest link of the overleaf paper can be found 
here




New changes for CMLA final paper:


Adding new changes to the paper, some are based on review feedback.




Image processing - server side 01
 - Dewraping, binarizing student uploaded images. - complete 
Samples Here


Image processing - server side 02
 - Rule line removal from student uploaded document images. - pending


Datamining - server side 01
 - Enhancements to Datamining on courses. 


Image processing - android 01
 - Document quality estimation: Accepting or rejecting the camera-upload documents based on image quality. - pending


Paper changes - section 1, section 2
 - simple text refinements, grammar and explanation. - complete


Paper changes - section 3
 - Detailed explanation on experiments and experience section. Adding a table to explain experiment clearly. - pending




Tasks next week




Rule line removal from student uploaded document images.


Enhancements to Datamining on courses.


Document quality estimation
